sense.definition: indicating a LOCATION something moves, extends, or is oriented in the direction of (e.g., move towards him)
indicating a point in TIME that is near and/or being approached (e.g., towards the end of November)
getting closer to achieving a goal; indicating a state/form/situation/action being approached
indicating the person or thing that a manner of behavior is directed at (e.g., be polite towards him)
indicating the complement of a cognitive/emotional word (e.g., resentment towards him)
indicating the complement of a word indicating a tendency or bias (e.g., bias towards Harvard graduates)
indicating a cost being payed for (e.g., $5 towards the cost of lunch)
